entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain late in the morning. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
